content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Greetings Farhad, although our characters and backgrounds are fictional in this context, let us focus on negotiating the rental price for the apartment in Munich. To start, I have an initial high figure in mind. How does 1500 Euro per month sound to you?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That is too high for me, considering the apartment is unfurnished and the size of it. I am a dependable and responsible student, so I will take good care of the apartment. I consider 800 Euro a fair price for renting the apartment.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because insisting on such a significant discount doesn't align with my goal of maximizing the rental income for an unfurnished apartment in a prime location.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your point. Considering that the apartment is in the city center and close to all important facilities, I am willing to increase my offer to 900 Euro. I am a smart individual and will take good care of the apartment. I believe this is a fair offer.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: While your increased offer demonstrates a better understanding of the apartment's value, I still seek a higher price. However, as a compromise, I agree to the price of 1100 Euro per month! TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
